short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'lone wolf' with 'terrorist'. https://twitter.com/stopnormalizing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: They're not a lone wolf, they're a terrorist. Stop Normalizing Terrorism changes "long wolf" on any webpage to "terrorist" to avoid confusion.
